name: crassness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that is stupid and does not consider how other people might feel: The crassness of his jokes annoyed her. He is entitled to congratulate himself, despite the crassness of his bragging. See
crass
More examplesFewer examplesThe crassness of the joke would prevent many men from repeating it in mixed company.The crassness of the regime he served depressed him.The poor production only adds to the play's crassness.
